member.summary: Whether to enable the video splicing feature If the video splicing feature is enabled, the real-time recording service will splice multiple video clips resulting from the pause into one video.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.Concat.Image
member.summary: Download address of the padding image used during video splicing. If it is not specified, a pure black image is used by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.CreateTranscodeRequest.SdkAppId
member.summary: SdkAppId of the customer

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.CreateTranscodeRequest.Url
member.summary: Address of the file for transcoding

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.CreateTranscodeRequest.IsStaticPPT
member.summary: Whether the PowerPoint file is static. The default value is False. If IsStaticPPT is False, documents with the .ppt or .pptx extension will be dynamically transcoded to HTML5 pages, and documents with other extensions will be statically transcoded to images. If IsStaticPPT is True, documents with any extensions will be statically transcoded to images.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.CreateTranscodeRequest.MinResolution
member.summary: Minimum resolution of the transcoded document. If no value or null is specified for it or the resolution format is invalid, the original document resolution is used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.CreateTranscodeRequest.ThumbnailResolution
member.summary:
Resolution of the thumbnail generated for the dynamically transcoded PowerPoint file. If no value or null is specified for it or the resolution format is invalid, no thumbnail will be generated. The resolution format is the same as that of MinResolution.
For static transcoding, this parameter does not work.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.CreateTranscodeRequest.CompressFileType
member.summary:
Compression format of the transcoded file. If no value or null is specified for it or the specified format is invalid, no compression file will be generated. Currently, the following compression formats are supported:
`zip`: generates a .zip compression package. `tar.gz: generates a .tar.gz compression package.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeOnlineRecordResponse.FinishReason
member.summary: Recording stop reason - AUTO: recording automatically stops because no upstream audio/video or whiteboard operation occurs in the room for a long time. - USER_CALL: the API for stopping recording is called. - EXCEPTION: an exception occurred during recording.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeOnlineRecordResponse.TaskId
member.summary: ID of the recording task to be queried.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeOnlineRecordResponse.Status
member.summary: Recording task status - PREPARED: preparing - RECORDING: recording - PAUSED: recording is paused. - STOPPED: recording is stopped, and the recorded video is being processed and uploaded. - FINISHED: the recorded video has been processed and uploaded, and the recording result is generated.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeOnlineRecordResponse.RoomId
member.summary: Room ID

member.summary: Group ID of the whiteboard

member.summary: ID of the recording user

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeOnlineRecordResponse.RecordStartTime
member.summary: Actual recording start time, which is a UNIX timestamp in seconds

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeOnlineRecordResponse.RecordStopTime
member.summary: Actual recording stop time, which is a UNIX timestamp in seconds

member.summary: Total video playback duration, in milliseconds

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.Pages
member.summary: Total number of document pages

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.Progress
member.summary: Transcoding progress. Value range: 0 to 100

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.Resolution
member.summary: Document resolution

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.ResultUrl
member.summary: URL of the transcoding result Dynamic transcoding: link of the HTML5 page transcoded from a PowerPoint file Static transcoding: URL prefix of the image transcoded for each document page. For example, if the URL prefix is `http://example.com/g0jb42ps49vtebjshilb/`, the image URL of the first page is `http://example.com/g0jb42ps49vtebjshilb/1.jpg`, and so on.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.Status
member.summary: Current task state - QUEUED: queuing for transcoding - PROCESSING: transcoding is in progress - FINISHED: transcoded

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.TaskId
member.summary: Unique ID of the transcoding task

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.Title
member.summary: Document name

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.ThumbnailUrl
member.summary:
URL prefix of the thumbnail. If the URL prefix is `http://example.com/g0jb42ps49vtebjshilb/ `, the thumbnail URL for the first page of the dynamically transcoded PowerPoint file is `http://example.com/g0jb42ps49vtebjshilb/1.jpg`, and so on.
If the document transcoding request carries the ThumbnailResolution parameter and the transcoding type is dynamic transcoding, this parameter is not null. In other cases, this parameter is null.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.ThumbnailResolution
member.summary: Resolution of the thumbnail generated for dynamic transcoding

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.CompressFileUrl
member.summary: URL for downloading the transcoded and compressed file. If `CompressFileType` carried in the document transcoding request is null or is not a supported compression format, this parameter is null.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.DescribeTranscodeResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.LayoutParams.Width
member.summary: Stream image width. Value range: [2,3000]

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.LayoutParams.Height
member.summary: Stream image height. Value range: [2,3000]

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.LayoutParams.X
member.summary: Offset of the top point in the upper-left corner of the current image to the X axis of the top point in the upper-left corner of the canvas. Default value: 0. Value range: [0,3000].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.LayoutParams.Y
member.summary: Offset of the top point in the upper-left corner of the current image to the Y axis of the top point in the upper-left corner of the canvas. Default value: 0. Value range: [0,3000].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.LayoutParams.ZOrder
member.summary: Z-axis position of the image. The default value is 0. The Z axis determines the overlap sequence of images. The image with the largest z-axis value is at the top layer.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.LayoutParams.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.summary: Whether stream mixing is enabled

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.MixStream.DisableAudio
member.summary: Whether audio stream mixing is disabled

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.MixStream.ModelId
member.summary: ID of the embedded mixed stream layout template. Valid values: 1 and 2. For more information on the differences of both values, see the sample embedded mixed stream layout template. If the Custom field is not specified, ModelId is required.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.MixStream.TeacherId
member.summary: ID of a teacher account This field is valid only when ModelId is specified. If you specify TeacherID for a user, the user's video stream will be displayed in the first image of the embedded template.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.MixStream.Custom
member.summary: Custom mixed stream layout parameter If this parameter is available, the ModelId and TeacherId fields will be ignored.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.MixStream.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.OmittedDuration.ResumeTime

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.RecordControl.Enabled
member.summary: It specifies whether to enable RecordControl. Valid values: true (yes); false (no).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.RecordControl.DisableRecord
member.summary:
A global parameter generally used in conjunction with `StreamControls` that specifies whether to disable recording. Valid values:
true: no stream is recorded. false: all streams are recorded. Default value: false.
The setting in this parameter is applied to all streams. However, if `StreamControls` is passed in, the parameters in `StreamControls` will take precedence.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.RecordControl.DisableAudio
member.summary:
A global parameter generally used in conjunction with `StreamControls` that specifies whether to disable audio recording over all streams. Valid values:
true: no audio recording of any streams. false: audio recording of all streams. Default value: false.
The setting in this parameter is applied to all streams. However, if `StreamControls` is passed in, the parameters in `StreamControls` will take precedence.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.RecordControl.PullSmallVideo
member.summary:
A global parameter generally used in conjunction with `StreamControls` that specifies whether to record low-resolution videos only. Valid values:
true: only records low-resolution videos for all streams. Please ensure that the up-streaming end pushes the low-resolution videos. Otherwise, the recorded video may be black. false: high-resolution video recording of all streams. Default value: false.
The setting in this parameter is applied to all streams. However, if `StreamControls` is passed in, the parameters in `StreamControls` will take precedence.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.RecordControl.StreamControls
member.summary: Parameters over specific streams, which take priority over global configurations. If it’s empty, all streams are recorded according to the global configurations.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.RecordControl.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.SetOnlineRecordCallbackKeyRequest.CallbackKey
member.summary: Authentication key for the real-time recording callback. It is a string that can have up to 64 characters. If an empty string is passed in, the existing callback authentication key will be deleted. For more information, please [see here](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/1137/40257?from_cn_redirect=1).

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.summary: SdkAppId of the customer

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.SetOnlineRecordCallbackRequest.Callback
member.summary: Callback address of the real-time recording task result. If an empty string is passed in, the existing callback address will be deleted. The callback address only supports the HTTP or HTTPS protocol, so the callback address must start with `http://` or `https://`. For the callback format, please [see here](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/1137/40258?from_cn_redirect=1).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.SdkAppId
member.summary: SdkAppId of the customer

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.RoomId
member.summary: ID of the room for recording. Value range: (1, 4294967295)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.RecordUserId
member.summary: User ID used by the real-time recording service for entering a room. Its format is `tic_record_user_${RoomId}_${Random}`, where `${RoomId}` indicates the ID of the room for recording and `${Random}` is a random string. The ID must be an unused ID in the SDK. The real-time recording service uses the user ID to enter the room for audio, video, and whiteboard recording. If this ID is already used in the SDK, the SDK and recording service will conflict, affecting the recording operation.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.RecordUserSig
member.summary: Signature corresponding to RecordUserId

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.GroupId
member.summary: (Disused) IM group ID of the whiteboard. By default, it is the same as the room ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.Concat
member.summary: Real-time recording video splicing parameter

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.Whiteboard
member.summary: Real-time recording whiteboard parameter, such as the whiteboard width and height

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.MixStream
member.summary: Real-time recording stream mixing parameter Notes: 1. The stream mixing feature needs to be enabled separately. If you need the feature, contact TIW customer service. 2. To use the stream mixing feature, the Extras parameter is required and must contain "MIX_STREAM".

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.Extras
member.summary: List of advanced features used List of possible values: MIX_STREAM - Stream mixing feature

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.AudioFileNeeded
member.summary: Whether to return the audio-only recording file of different streams in the result callback. The file format is mp3.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StartOnlineRecordRequest.RecordControl
member.summary: A group of real-time recording parameters. It specifies the streams to be recorded, whether to disable the audio recording, and whether to record only low-resolution videos, etc.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StreamControl.StreamId
member.summary:
Video stream ID Description of the possible video stream ID values: 1. `tic_record_user`: the whiteboard video stream 2. `tic_substream`: the auxiliary video stream 3. Specific user ID: the video stream of the specified user
The actual recording uses the prefix match of the video stream ID. The real stream becomes the specified stream once its ID prefix matches with the stream ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StreamControl.DisableRecord
member.summary:
Whether to disable recording over the stream.
true: does not record this stream. This stream will not be included in the final recording file. false: records this stream. This stream will be included in the final recording file.
Default value: false

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StreamControl.DisableAudio
member.summary:
Whether to disable the audio recording of the stream.
true: does not record the audio of the stream. In the final recording file, this stream will be soundless. false: the stream has both video and audio recording.
Default value: false

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StreamControl.PullSmallVideo
member.summary:
Whether to only record low-resolution stream videos.
true: records only low-resolution videos. In this case, please make sure that the client pushes low-resolution videos upstream. Otherwise, the recorded video may be black. false: records only high-resolution videos.
Default value: false

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StreamControl.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StreamLayout.LayoutParams
member.summary: Stream layout configuration

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StreamLayout.InputStreamId
member.summary: Video stream ID Description of the possible video stream ID values: 1. tic_record_user: the current picture is used to display the whiteboard video stream. 2. tic_substream: the current picture is used to display the auxiliary video stream. 3. Specific user ID: the current picture is used to display the video stream of a specific user. 4.Left empty: the current picture is vacant for new video stream.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StreamLayout.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Background color in RGB format, such as "#FF0000" for red. The default color is black.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StreamLayout.FillMode
member.summary:
Video filling mode.
0: self-adaption mode. Scales the video proportionally to completely display it in the specified area. In this mode, there may be black bars. 1: full-screen mode. Scales the video to make it fill the entire specified area. In this mode, no black bars will appear, but the video may not be displayed fully.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tiw.V20190919.Models.StreamLayout.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.
